definition: ordinary mail (as opposed to air mail etc)
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: The insanity can magnify and motorize the snail mail.
sentences.chinese: 招致能放大和動力化平信。

sentences.english: How long does it take by regular mail?
sentences.chinese: 我寄平信。需要多久時間到達？

sentences.english: What's the standard rate to send a letter to Beijing by air?
sentences.chinese: 寄一封平信到北京的標準空郵收費是多少？

sentences.english: Do you wish to send it as an ordinary or registered letter ?
sentences.chinese: 你想寄一封平信還是掛號信？

sentences.english: No, just send it by regular mail .
sentences.chinese: 不需要，用平信寄就可以了。

sentences.english: It takes about a week by general delivery and four or five days by express.
sentences.chinese: 平信約需一星期，快信需要四至五天。

sentences.english: We used to send letters. Now you trade text messages instantaneously.
sentences.chinese: 以前我們寄平信，現在你們交換即時短信。

sentences.english: How much is the postage for sending a surface mail letter to Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 往上海寄封平信需要貼多少錢的郵票？

sentences.english: We usury correspond with OUr people abroad in clear .
sentences.chinese: 我們通常與在國外的本國人民用平信聯繫。

sentences.english: You want to send it by ordinary mail or by EMS?
sentences.chinese: 您是寄平信還是寄特快專遞？

sentences.english: I will send this letter by ordinary mail.
Mr. G: Airmail, or standard mail?
sentences.chinese: 你要寄航空信還是平信？

sentences.english: She sent him a surface letter.

definition: letter sheet (similar to an aerogram but not necessarily sent by airmail)
to forward (a message, letter, article etc)
